name: io.github.jasonxkensei/xproof
title: xProof
description: Proof primitive for AI agents on MultiversX. Certify file existence and ownership by anchoring SHA-256 hashes on-chain. Tools: certify_file, verify_proof, get_proof, discover_services. Supports x402 payment (USDC on Base, no API key needed) and Bearer auth. $0.05 per certification.
